text: @marklevinshow Hey dumbass, Obama wasn't promoting a drug for Covid-19  back in 2008...he took it for the drug's intended purpose...malaria prevention!!  @BarackObama should sue your ass for being dumb enough to post this💩. You violated the law with this post.🙄🙄🙄🙄🙄
